trans-unit.source: The type of elements in the array.
Represents an element in a multidimensional array that can be used as an l-value in an expression.
trans-unit.target: 代表多維陣列中的項目，可用來做為運算式中的左值 (l-value)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses <xref:System.Activities.Expressions.MultidimensionalArrayItemReference%601> in an `Assign` activity to assign an integer value to the array element at row 1 and column 2 and prints the value of the array element to the console.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會在 <xref:System.Activities.Expressions.MultidimensionalArrayItemReference%601> 活動中使用 `Assign`，將整數值指派至資料列 1 及資料行 2 的陣列項目，並將陣列項目的值列印至主控台。

trans-unit.source: The `Assign` activity is equivalent to the following statement when using arrays: `array[1, 2] = 1;`.
trans-unit.target: 使用陣列時，`Assign` 活動相當於下列陳述式：`array[1, 2] = 1;`。

trans-unit.source: Instead of instantiating the <xref:System.Activities.Expressions.MultidimensionalArrayItemReference%601> l-value expression activity directly, it is strongly recommended that you call <xref:System.Activities.Expressions.ExpressionServices.ConvertReference%2A>, which provides a higher level of abstraction and enables you to implement your workflow more intuitively.
trans-unit.target: 強烈建議您呼叫 <xref:System.Activities.Expressions.MultidimensionalArrayItemReference%601>，而非直接具現化 <xref:System.Activities.Expressions.ExpressionServices.ConvertReference%2A> 左值 (l-value) 運算式活動，因為前者可以提供層級較高的抽象概念，並讓您以更直覺的方式實作工作流程。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Expressions.MultidimensionalArrayItemReference`1" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Expressions.MultidimensionalArrayItemReference`1" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the array referenced by the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Expressions.MultidimensionalArrayItemReference`1" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Expressions.MultidimensionalArrayItemReference`1" /> 所參考的陣列。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of arguments that represent the indices of the element in the array.
trans-unit.target: 取得引數集合，代表陣列中項目的索引。

trans-unit.source: The indices of the element in the array.
The <xref:System.Activities.Expressions.MultidimensionalArrayItemReference%601.Indices%2A> property is read-only, but the items in the collection can be modified and the indices can be changed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Activities.Expressions.MultidimensionalArrayItemReference%601.Indices%2A> 屬性是唯讀的，但您可以修改集合中的項目及變更索引。
